body: I couldn't enter Avicus today. As you can guess I wonder that=did the update come?

title: New Avicus update?

replies.body: It did not, I think. Ivy is gonna update the Website and the Gameserver at the same time ("my opinion")

replies.body: Wait another update? And what is now with the Omega Update?

replies.body: Nope. I believe the hubs are down.
replies.body_tagged: Nope. I believe the hubs are down.

replies.body: If you would like to join a game with some players direct connect to: mczone02.avic.us
replies.body_tagged: If you would like to join a game with some players direct connect to: mczone02.avic.us

replies.body: ^ Like Riley stated above. You'll need to direct connect to a game and do /server from there. The hubs are currently down. Sorry about the trouble guys ^-^
